metadata.title: CVE-2019-12495 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tiny C Compiler (aka TinyCC or TCC) 0.9.27.Compiling a crafted source file leads to a one-byte out-of-bounds write inthe gsym_addr function in x86_64-gen.c. This occurs because tccasm.cmishandles section switches.

criterions.comment: tcc package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
